name: Pop Out
description:
Pop Out is a 2D action and real-time-strategy video game. This is a game where colored entities named Outer fill an arena continuously. The player can pose entities named Pop that seek to destroy the Outer of their colors. There are different types of Outer entities such as mono-color, bicolor or tricolor that are more difficult to destroy. The player also have power ups to help him destroy Outers entities. The player can select a “pop” color and place it in the arena with a cursor. The goal is to prevent the saturation of the arena by the Outers until the end of the timer.

This is a student project made during the second year of bachelor of game design at ICAN, Paris. There are few levels but the development is likely to evolve and the game was design in order to be playable on mobile.

___________________________________________________________________________

FEATURES :

  • A unique and thrilling gameplay to test your speed and reflexes
  • Very simple mechanics to learn and master
  • Different levels of difficulty to challenge you 
  • Colourful experience with lots of fireworks everywhere!

___________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS (only mouse and keyboard) : 

Gameplay :

  • Left click to place a Pop entity
  • Middle click to scroll and select the Pop's colour you'll place afterwards

Debug : 

  • R to restart
  • P to pause

___________________________________________________________________________

Made by these 4 students in Game Design at ICAN, Paris :

  • Loic Bennis (level design)
  • Florian Hubert (game design, qa testing, documentation)
  • Thomas Lourties (game design,sound design, graphic design)
  • Trung Tin Nguyen (programming, vfx)
